tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_concerns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  concern TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Alert (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    concern_id INT,
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeConcerns (
    concern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    concern_description TEXT,
    concern_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concern_id INT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Acknowledgements (
    acknowledgement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_id INT,
    acknowledged_by VARCHAR(50),
    acknowledgement_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Departments (
    department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    department_name VARCHAR(50),
    department_head VARCHAR(50)
)
